paper_abstract: In this paper, a general class of neural networks with memristive synapses and multiple delays is introduced and studied. Within mathematical framework of the Filippov solution, some analytical results on the Lagrange stability are established. The derived results can characterize the fundamental electrical properties of memristor devices and provide certain theoretical guidelines for applications. paper_title: Lagrange stability of neural networks with memristive synapses and multiple delays
